features: Design: Plush, bright and mixed fabric spiral design which wraps easily around the handle bar of any stroller to spark curiosity and keep baby engaged no matter where you go together
Developmental benefits: Soft and interactive fabrics featuring varied textures and shapes that encourage baby to reach, bat grab and enjoy sensory play
Great for gifting: This set is packaged in easy-to-wrap packaging and is a suitable gift for any occasion including baby showers, birthdays, Christmas, Easter and more
Cleaning: Spot clean only with damp cloth or sponge, do not machine wash
Infantino, smartly designed products for happy parenting: We design smartly, we have fun and we're overjoyed when an idea evolves full circle into a product loved and used daily by parents everywhere
body.description: This fun spiral includes four visually delightful hanging toys in perfect batting and grabbing range. Perfect for baby's gross motor skill development and visual tracking.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on July 8, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for uppababy vista bumper bar
reviews.reviewText: My baby took to this right away! My baby is 3 months old and loves to go on walks in her uppababy vista. She is also really enjoying reaching for toys and tugging on them so I looked at many toys like this for her bumper bar. I picked this for a few reasons. 1) the toys aren't too long, which works great on the vista bumper bar. The toys would be unreachable if I put them on her carseat handle, so I don't recommend this toy for that use. 2) there are a variety of toys. So far my baby likes grabbing the rings the most, but I anticipate she will like the mirror and other toys quite a bit as well. 3) the price was on the lower end of the range I saw these toys sold for. One minor complaint is that the toy is very scrunched up. To get the toys spread out I had to use two rings from other toys to wedge the ends of this toy in. That kept the toy stretched out so that my little one could easily see each toy distinctly and play with them individually. Hopefully with time the toys stretches out more. All in all, I am super happy and definitely recommend this toy.

reviews.reviewText: My baby loves it she stays entertained during walks and car rides I found that it scrunches up and no matter what I did to keep it stretched out it would still scrunch up until I put it on the stroller shade ! It stays and will not scrunch up anymore and i found it easier because it’s in perfect reach for her and I don’t have to fidget with it when I’m trying to use the stroller arm !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars We made the right choice
reviews.reviewText: We ordered this item because my son hates being in his car seat and we were looking for something, anything that could possibly help make it more tolerable for him. After looking through several different car seat toy options and reading through reviews we ultimately decided this item was best. Reviews mentioned that it stays too tightly coiled but this is not an issue for us as we weren’t looking to have it permanently attached to the car seat handle any way. Our intentions were never to use it while driving, but rather as a distraction when we are shopping, running errands, or going for walks... how tightly or loosely it coil has no effect on its purpose to distract our baby. As soon as we received the item we took it out and inspected it. It was in mint condition. We washed it in a net bag in the washing machine and let it air dry attached to the car seat handle (we did not coil it around the handle but rather stretched it out so only the ends of the toy were wrapped around the widest point of the handle—this loosened the coil and it isn’t so tightly wound anymore, it worked perfectly). This toy is exactly what we were looking for!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This was my daughter's favorite toy when she was a baby. It crinkles and it hung from her car seat. It encouraged her to reach for it the bright colors and play.

Smaller than I expected but good value for money compared to similar products. Nice colours and good variety of hanging “toys”. Good multi use and easy to hang off different items to entertain baby. My baby hasn’t been too interested yet but not sure I can blame the product as he is still young!

reviews.reviewTitle: spring needs to be less tight
reviews.reviewText: It’s cute but the spring is too tight so it remains clumped together. We are using it on the stroller bar in front of the baby, but since toys are too heavy, they aren’t as visible to the baby.

Fantastic product! Quality made, really nice bright colours. My son has loved this toy since day 1 and I would 100% buy again. Works well on the rumble seat bar of our uppa baby vista and on the handle of our uppababy mesa car seat. Wraps on/off easily and toys are at a good length for baby to play with (although fairly high up depending on how the car seat handle is positioned at the time)
My six month old occasionally plays with this. It’s perfect for the stroller so you don’t keep chasing after toys that fall out.
